About.main-paragraph: I'm Lea ! I used to organise cultural and artistic projects. And one day, I decided to add a string to my bow.

Project1.title: Archipel Contact
Project1.description: Complete redesign and restructuring of the website. Archipel Contact is a travel agency specialised in tailored trips to Indonesia.

Project2.title: Daily Orsay
Project2.description: This is a little project that uses the RMN-GP API - a group of French museums. The website displays new artworks everyday, which are part of the Orsay Museum's collection. Click and discover a painting, a sculpture and a photograph !

Project3.title: Portfolio
Project3.description: This is where you are right now! My portefolio will evolve through time with new projects... and I will improve it with my everyday learning.

Project4.title: Find My Art
Project4.description: Find My Art is the final group project made during my professional training. It is an online art library. Just like a library but for art! You can rent the artwork of your choice and display it on your wall for a limited amount of time. Users can connect to their account and book the artworks they want in the website's collection. The website has a back office that allows administrators to manage users accounts and artworks.
